posts.post_content:
Good morning all,

In the mood to buy some cards, please send me any list or individual cards, SGC 50/60 only please. Two requests:

1. I am not interested in SGC 50 commons priced at $70, so no links to pages with absurd prices. I will pay market prices and do so happily for cards I need.

2. NO PSA cards

thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]
